name: Project: Riot
description:
'Project: Riot' is the latest 3D roguelike on the market. Currently in it's Beta phase, we created this game as part of our final project at Priestley college, the game you see was produced in 10 short weeks.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You play as Chris Davidson aka “Five”, who was imprisoned for unknown reasons by some awfully weird creatures.

He’s been trapped for 10 months blending more and more with the customs of his new prison life, stripping him of his individuality. But he has finally been given his window of opportunity to escape when a riot breaks out. He has no choice but to fight his way out for freedom. Or die trying. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You play as an inmate in prison. A riot breaks out, using this as a distraction the player will attempt to escape. The player will have a limited amount of time before the game begins to collect as many resources to aid them before the prison goes into lockdown- the more items then the better equipped and more advantaged the player will be . Once the prison goes into lockdown the player has to fight enemies as you move from room to room, the player WILL NOT regain health, they will have no choice but to keep progressing and escape or die trying
